description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis- Heal Hyperthyroid Now Using Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

These days many women are suffering from the problem of hyperthyroid. In this lesson you will learn the most common reasons for hyperthyroid and most serious problems of hyperthyroid and learn how self hypnosis can help you heal your hyperthyroid easily and effectively.

In this lesson, you will learn a powerful guided visualization exercise to heal your hyperthyroid easily. Hypnosis visualization is a very powerful tool to program your mind for positive changes and improvements.

You will also learn how to heal your hyperthyroid mentally and psychologically and have a positive frame of mind and good health.

By the end of the course you will be able to overcome the problem of hyperthyroid and feel more positive about your self.

It is also very helpful for people who want to get over depression , anxiety , insomnia , negativity and stress.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 6 lectures in English including a bonus E-book
title: Hypnosis- Heal HyperThyroid Now Using Self Hypnosis
